Detailed Description

Helper class for qmdiTabWidget.

This class is a new tab bar, which emits some new signals on mouse clicks. This helps some operations on the tab widget, like recognizing right clicks and middle clicks.

Member Function Documentation

QPoint  where
)  [signal]
 

emited when a user presses the middle mouse button [SIGNAL]

Parameters:
tabNumber the number of the tab pressed
where the location on the screen (relative) where the user clicked
This is an emited signal which happens when the middle mouse on the tab bar

void qmdiTabBar::mousePressEvent (  QMouseEvent *  event  )  [protected]
 

mouse pressed event handler

Parameters:
event This is an overloaded function, which will emit a signal with the tab number which was pressed. There are 2 signals emited: middleMousePressed(int) and rightMousePressed(int)
